column4: Any way I can see the output grub is passing when I boot to a non-linux os?
or press E on the GRUB entry at startup to (E)dit the entry, and B to (B)oot it.
Yeah, I've tried that, but I want to see what occurs after grub quits and Windows begins to boot; me issue is grub finishing properly (ubuntu boots fine) but windows failing. I get no errors, though
